== Software requirements ==

=== IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover ===

IL2DCE has dependencies to the following assemblies of _IL-2 Sturmovik: Cliffs of Dover_:
 * core.dll
 * gamePages.dll
 * gamePlay.dll
 * gameWorld.dll
They are located at _$home\parts\core_.
